Durability.comm: The glasses are fragile and can break easily.

cont.entity_a: Resistant to breaking. Extremely resistant to scratches and breaking, even when dropped. They are durable but not indestructible. More durable than Riedel glasses. Not as durable as advertised.
cont.entity_b: Surviving accidental knocks. Not as durable as claimed, with some breaking easily. Not as durable as expected.

cont.entity_a: Resemble lead crystal in appearance without the weight. Feel elegant and enhance the wine-tasting experience. Suitable for both red and white wine.
cont.entity_b: Elegant and stylish, similar to restaurant quality. Contemporary look and feel. Feel high-end.

cont.entity_a: Hold up well in the dishwasher and maintain clarity. Can cloud over time.
cont.entity_b: Recommended to hand wash. May not withstand frequent use.

cont.entity_a: The 25-ounce size is perfect for enjoying the wine's aroma.
cont.entity_b: Larger than typical wine glasses, allowing wine to breathe.

cont.entity_a: Excellent value for the price. Great deal for the price.
Some glasses have seams on the stem, which detracts from the quality. The foot of the glass has uneven parts.
cont.entity_b: Some glasses have noticeable seams and imperfections.

cont.entity_a: Versatile for both everyday use and formal settings. Can be used for water, wine, or cocktails.
cont.entity_b: Suitable for everyday use and entertaining.
Customer service is responsive and helpful.

cont.entity_a: Some glasses arrived with defects or were broken.
cont.entity_b: Well-packaged and arrive in good condition. Some glasses arrived with defects or were broken.

cont.entity_a: Thin but sturdy enough to withstand accidental knocks.
cont.entity_b: Have a nice weight and balance. Lightweight and easy to handle.
